seo: showdoc,默认密码漏洞,在线检测
summary: 该插件用于检测showdoc应用是否存在默认密码（用户名：showdoc，密码：123456）的漏洞，通过发送POST请求验证是否可以成功登录。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the showdoc application has a default password (username: showdoc, password: 123456) vulnerability by sending a POST request to verify if login is successful.
